name: news-1
author: skyler
title: Welcome to version 0.1.0!
body:
Welcome to the brand-new site for \nooline!

The project is currently hosted over on GitHub: \nooline, and forks are welcome, as are any questions.

Things forthcoming:

  • Documentation (as always).
  • A little bit of hardening.
  • Mechanisms/hooks for modules and extending.
  • A sandbox/demo area would be sweet.
  • Oh, and a WYSIWYG editor. Gotta have one of those.

Stay tuned!
